name: Blue Cornbread
description: Blue cornmeal is sweeter and has a better nutritional profile than its yellow and white cousins. Try out blue cornmeal in this moist and tender blue cornbread! Adapted from Daily Garnish.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 375Â°. In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together the cornmeal, flour, baking soda and salt, set aside.
